transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan mam. Hello.
Executive: Ji sir aapka call disconnect ho gaya tha. Aap ye bol rahe the ki aapko maturity ka issue aa raha tha. Ji please bataiye sir.
Customer: Haan sale sale nahi ho raha mam. Monthly ke isme mera sale ho raha tha. Lekin maine trust seal liya aapka annual package. To usme bhi sale nahi ho raha mam ek bhi order abhi do mahine do ya teen mahine hone mein aa rahe lagta. Lekin ho raha nahi sale.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Mujhe ye bataiye pehle aap keh rahe hain ki pehle aapki monthly sale jyada thi. To per month basically aap kya kitna sale kar lete the agar main baat karu.
Customer: Monthly mera ek ya do deal hua tha mam.
Executive: Haan haan. Lekin haan isliye fir maine socha ki abhi trust seal le leta hu. Mam kaha ki leads bhi jyada milenge to mera business badh sakta hai.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Usi hisab se maine trust seal liya tha lekin trust seal lene ke baad me ek bhi customer aaye nahi mam. New conversion ho hi nahi hai sale ho hi nahi hai.
Executive: Trust seal lene ke baad bhi aapko customer nahi mil rahe aap ye keh rahe ho.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Sir main aapko bata deti hu just ek minute ruk jaaiye. Abhi aap trust seal ki service chala rahe ho first of all. Aap cattle feed mein deal kar rahe ho?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Cattle feeds mein feed mein agar aap deal kar rahe ho aap us category ki leads utha rahe ho. Lekin wo aapka as an product nahi added hai agar main baat karu.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute mam.
Executive: Haan. Aap IndiaMART abhi login karke aap baith sakte hain kya?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Mam.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan mam main aapko paanch minute mein call back karta hu.
Executive: Kab tak connect karu sir main aapko?
Customer: Paanch das minute mein.
Executive: Thik hai sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting sales after TrustSeal.

- No new customer conversion after TrustSeal.



Resolution:

- Executive asked if dealing in cattle feed.

- Executive asked to login to IndiaMART.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back in 5-10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, sales, leads, cattle feed
